div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiii die
mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day the borghe fundin one Johne murray be Johne lesly of wardris
contenit in the bouk obefor witht consent of the saide Johne lesly and patry gor
done procurator for the saide Johne of murray Is continewit to this day xv
dais in hope of Concorde but preiudice tile ony party or to the process'

The saide day patry chirnside grantit him avinge to Johne' andersoun'
xxtj s' quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day Johne auchneywe tuk to prewe this day xv dais that
Williame patersone eldast sone to vmquhile Dauy patersone was
entirit ayr to the said Dauy and annaleit his saide ayrschipe to vmquhile
Williame gareauche and was put in the possessioun' of his fadir land'

The saide day thome lesly and thome Ridale grantit to releiw gilbert
litstar of sex eln' of blak clatht clamyt be Dauy colpe et cetera befor
the aldirmane and balyes thar Jugis ordinar ande denyt ony wrange done
to the saide gilbert anent the saide clath of offerit thame reddy tile vndirly
the law thar anent befor the saide aldirmane and bailyes

The saide day It was deliuirit be ane suorne assis' alexander gray
forspeakar that Alexander sclatar has done wrange in the non fulfil
linge of his condicioun' maide to Johne' lesly of warderis that
he has nocht vphaldin his biginge and hous' et cetera and that the saide
alexander awe tile vphalde ale the bigin of the saide Johnez' within
the toune the saide Johne' fyndinge him stuff tharto accordinge for
sclatinge et cetera

The saide day William ranesone lauchfully callit tile haue
Entirit criste schande tile ansuer for stribulance of thomez'
narnys wif comperit nocht et cetera tharfor the aldirman ordanit
the saide William tile Entir the saide cristy to comper this day
xv dais tile ansuer for the stribulance of the saide woman

The saide day for the offence done to Androw lousoun' be alexander
nory It was deliuirit and ordanyt be the aldirman and counsale
with consent of bath the saide partiis thai beinge oblist tharto be the
fathis of thar bodies that the saide Alexander sale sitt done one
his kneis in the plane court and ask the said Androw forgewnes
and sale depoun' be his aitht he kennys him ane leile trewe
mane and sale gif ane li' of wax to the haly blud lycht
ande gif euire he committis ony traspas to the saide Androw or ony
vtheris in tyme to cum ande beis conuikit tharof sale pay xl s'
to sanct nicholes wark vneforgevin

The saide day It was deliuirit be ane suorne assis' Duncane
colisone forpsekar that thome ridale sale ger Input the
countour clamyt and follouit be Dauy colpe tutor tile Isabele
buchane douchtir tile vmquhile Williame buchane and ayr
in the hous' quhar It was obefor betuix this and friday nixt tocum
Ande quhar the saide thomas allegit tak of the saide forbuthe
perteninge to the saide Isabell as ayr to hir saide fadir and to the said
Dauy hir tutor et cetera It was deliuirit be the saide assis' Duncane
Collisoun' forspekar that gif the saide thomas previs the tak of
the saide buthe set to him for this yer one friday nixt to cum
he Is quyt of the wrange occupacioun' of the saide buthe ande
gif he failyes in his preive thai cane nocht acquyt him of the
wranguis' occupacioun' of the saide buthe Ande thai funde the
said thomas did' wrange in the avay takin of the saide
countour ffor the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court ande
awe to restor the said countour and that was gevin fordome

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvijo die mensis Octobris anno quo supra

The said day patry musky tuk to preive this day xv dais
befor the aldirman and balyeis Androw murray pait of the maile of
his landis quhilkis he occupeis liande in the newburghe

head.add: the graunt of the expens' of the aldirman and commissaris passand in the tovnis erandis mastir Androw cadiow of stanewod'

div.p:
The saide day the counsale and communite of the saide burghe'
warnit be the hande bell and the officiaris throue the haile tone
gathterit and circualy Inquiryt consent and ordanit commissaris
to be maide one the tovnis expens' to pas befor our souerane
lorde and his counsale to defende the actioun' follouit be mastir
Androw cadiow agane thame et cetera ande to follow androue
frasere of stanewode knycht et cetera his complicis eftir the tenor of
our souerane lordis summonce maide tharupoun' anent thar landis
of the tullocht' ande to defende agane the saide Androw and his complicis
eftir the tenor of his summonce maide one thame anent the saide landis
Ande thareftir thai chesit alexander menyeis aldirman Johne' of mar' ande
Johne' colisoun' bailies thar commissaris and procuratoris to pas folloue
and defende in the premiss' ande ordanit sufficient commissione
to be maide and gevin to thame ane and may als mony as accordis
vnder thar common' sele Ande ordanit tuenty merkis to be takin of
thar watir malis of the rediast that mycht be gottin and gevin to the
aldirman and Johne of mar to thar expens' and ordanit fourty schillingis
to be allouit to the saide Johne' colisoun' in his wattir maile to
his expens'

head.add: the graunt of ane burgis to sere Johane Stirueling

div.p:
The saide day the alderman bailyes and counsale grauntit and geff to thar
commoun' clerk and seruande Schir Johnne' stiruelinge ane burges to be chosin
be him frelie for his excercesioun' and labouris donn' in the makinge of thar pro
cess' of the landis of the tullocht' preceptis and vthir doingis et cetera gylbert menyeis ad herandam propria

The saide day the aldirman ballieis and Counsal present for witht ane consent for
the tyme grantit to gif xl s' to Johne Cuk to pay his hous' maile becaus'
of his gude seruice done to thame

The saide day patry mvske deponit be his aithe that quhen William Colp was sittand'
the Inlande to James gourlay / scho sperit at him quhen he walde sett hir' the
forbutht quhilkis scho now Inhabitis Ande the saide Williame saide to hir' Woman
ye sale haue it alslang as I or may Sone has It for viij s' of maile and
Scho oppinnit hir' purs' and gif to him j d' in arlys Ande thareftir thai passit
tile ane vthir hous' and he saide richt fray
The saide day Willaim scrimgeour deponit be his aithe that effy fyf deponit be hir'
aithe that Scho herde William Colp say to Cristiane lilburne avnt ye sale haue
your forbutht in mailing alslang as j haue It
The said day Johne auchneiwe concordis be his aithe with the saide Williamis
deposicioun'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis continevit the oppinning of the saide witnes to
monunday the pennult day of this Instant monetht of October' for waknes
of the court betuix Dauy colp and thome ridale

The saide day it was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balieis and consale
that the sagirstane sale haue for Ilkan graiwe makin and bellis Rigin
within the kirk and vteuthe the kirk in the kirkyerde
viij d' ande he sale ger' ring curfoyr continualie at hour' and tyme
aucht and wont Atour he sale nocht Ring laurence at the saule mess'
nor' menyngis bot for the nobillis and honorabilis personis of the tovne
without leif of the aldirman and the Counsale

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis Octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day marione Ranalde' was conuictit be ane Suorne assis'
Alexander gray forspekar for brekin of commone ordinance in housing of
wittal Ande thomas leslie balye was quyt of the wranguis' takin
of the pundis of the saide marion'

The saide day It was appontit and Accordit betuix sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht
one that ane part Ande Johne mar' procurator for Katherine Cullan and Anny
Cullane one that vthir part In manere and forme eftir follouing that Is to say
Thai ar' Oblist be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande and abide at
the deliuerance and decret of thir personis Robert blinsele Dauy menyeis
gilbert menyeis chosin be the said' knicht Alexander menyes aldirman mastir
Johne lindesay and patry leslie chosin be the saide Johne of mar' anent
ane lande clamyt be the said' Katherine and Anny et cetera Ande euire parte
sal ger' the personis chosin for thame be Suorne and tak the saide matir
to tham and falyeing of ony of tham siclik Ande giffurtht thar' decret
tharintill betuix this and yule nixt hereftir et cetera Ande the saide Johne of
mar' sal caus' the saide Weman to be bundin tharto Ande thar' salbe
ane compromis' maid' vndir the Selis of the partiis one the Souerastwis'
but inconuenientis

The saide day the court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for
dome that thome Ridall hade preuit Sufficientlie the tak of the
forbutht Sett to Cristiane lilburne Spous' to the said' thome Ridall quhile the
term of Witsonday next to cum for viij s' of maile In the yer'
be Williame Colp procurator to Dauy colp his Sone

The said' day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman and Counsale
that for de the gret Offence and strubulance done be george talyouris
to Wille huchonsone and hurting of him the saide george sal syt
done one his kneys and ask Johne of Knollis forgenves and the said'
William and pay the leche for the leching' of the saide William and v s'
to him In part of Amendis ande j li' of wax to the haly blud'
licht ande gif euire the said' george Offendis to the saide William'
or ony vthiris and beis conuictit tharof Sale pay v merkis to Sanct
nicholes werk batht the saide partiis being Oblist be the fathtis
of thar bodiis to stande at this deliuerance

The saide day Dauy colp Solempnitlie protestit quhat euire the warde of
the court happinnit to do Anent the forbutht clamit be thome Ridale
pertening to the saide Dauid as tutor tile Isabell buchan douchtir and ayr to
vmquhile buchan turne him to nay preiudice

The saide day the ballieis assignit friday that next is to cum to gilbert
henrisone tile Ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Robert talyour'
that he wrangis that makis him' nocht seruice as ane prenteys' sulde
do til his mastir' et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Androu
mortymar to preiwe Sextene Schillingis pait to the larde of allirdes
quhilkis Johne malysone clamit aving to him of the Witsonday
terme bigane

The saide day thome Ridall said' to Dauy colp that he hed'
done to him as ane fals' tratour' ande offerit him to preiwe
the samyn and kest done ane par of gluffis one the common'
kyst

Eodem die thomas Ridale conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore
Johannis Knollis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmj Colp Cuj emen
dabit ut Jura volunt Et Idem Willelmus Amercitur pro perturbio
dicti thome Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt sed maius perturbium
Compertum fuit in dicto thoma ex ore dicti Johannis prelocutoris
eiusdem

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Sexto
die Nouembris Anno quo supra

The saaie day mastir Androw patirsone one that ane part
ande Johne auchneiwe one that vthir part was oblist and
Suorne the gret aithez to stande and abide at the decret
ordinance and deliuerance of thir personis mastir Dauid
guthtre prouest of that Ilk Alexander Rede Williame Wormet
William futhes arbitouris and sere Johne Stirueling odman
chosin betuix thome anent the gudis of airschip clamit
be the saide Johne in his wiffis nayme as ayr to vm
quhile William gareauche and anent the gudis of arschip
clamit be the saide mastir Androu as ayr to vmquhile
Dauy patersone his fadir quhilkis personis was suorne
except' William futhes being absent /
